```{r echo=FALSE}
count<-c()
probability<-c()
EV<-c(rep(0,99))
#N->Num of elements in the array
looping<-function(numberofinterations,N){
  for(j in 1:(N-1))
  {
    for(i in 1:numberofinterations)
    {
      count[i]=findnum(N,j)
      EV[j]=EV[j]+count[i]
      #print(EV[j])
    }
  sumofN=sum(count==N)
  probability[j]=(sumofN*100)/numberofinterations
  }
  p=which.max(probability)/100
  print(p)
  plot(EV/numberofinterations)
  plot(probability,type="l")
  #plot(EV/numberofinterations,type="l")
}

findnum<-function(N,Split_num){
  numlist=sample(c(1:N),N,replace=FALSE)
  Current_Best=max(numlist[1:Split_num])
  for(i in (Split_num+1):N)
  {
    if(numlist[i]> Current_Best)
    {
      Current_Best=numlist[i]
      return(Current_Best)
    }
  }
  return(numlist[N])
}
looping(100000,100)
```
